//DashboardActivity Are you sure you want to leave the application? Yes, please. No, I want to stay here.

//Registration Enter full name. Enter email address. Please enter correct email address. Enter password. Enter confirm password. Enter dynamic access code. Enter date of birth. Male Female You are successfully registered with us. \n\n To complete this process please enter email verification code, which we sent you on your registered email address.
Enter email verification code. Your email address has been successfully verified. \n\n To complete this process please proceed to questionnaire. Verification code sent on your email address.
Please select answer
//Report Upload Report attachment must be required. Please click on Browse Report button to attach report. Report has been uploaded successfully. Report Upload Status
Your appointment request has been submitted successfully.\n\nYour request will be reviewed & approved by the admin. **Note - Your request will be reviewed & approved by the admin.
